item.title: Bun vs Node Benchmark - no one cares about speed as much as your CI does
item.description: Bun is fast. But honestly I almost don't care that much about the fact that it can handle more requests. What matters for me is how much it affects my dev experience. And I'll give you a TLDR; It's amazing! See how Bun performs in a non-typical benchmark.
